text:
Fabrizio Mioni (September 23, 1930 – June 8, 2020) was an Italian-American actor. He was born in Rome. Mioni was known for his roles as Renaud in "Roland the Mighty" (1956), Jason in "Hercules" (1958) and as Armand in "Get Yourself a College Girl" (1964).
Mioni died on June 8, 2020 at his home in Los Angeles, aged 89.
